author: Flo
content:
I agree with you about you choice of the photo you featured this time. I love its bands of information and I might even call them the image's story line. In this image, more so than in the others, the story is of the now-frozen water which had carried with it, like baggage, those rounded river stones. And like other travelers, the water dropped the baggage stones that became too heavy to carry.

I also love the ice flowers that look like daisies in some of the other images. I might call them "winter daisies" or something similar.
